entry.string:
On a locked site only the following users and groups will have access.
Entering a group name allows access to the users of that group.
Unknown names will be ignored.
entry.translation:
On a lucked seete-a oonly zee fullooeeng users und gruoops veell hefe-a eccess.
Intereeng a gruoop neme-a elloos eccess tu zee users ooff thet gruoop.
Unknoon nemes veell be-a ignured. Bork bork bork!

entry.string:
The following message will be emailed to members in the above list when the site is locked or unlocked.
It is prefaced by a short: "Site <sitename> has been locked/unlocked".
entry.translation:
Zee fullooeeng messege-a veell be-a imeeeled tu meemburs in zee ebufe-a leest vhee zee seete-a is lucked oor unlucked. Bork bork bork!
It is preffeced by a shurt: "Seete-a <seeteneme-a> hes beee lucked/unlucked".

entry.string: The following message will be displayed to members who are locked out when they try to login:
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng messege-a veell be-a deespleyed tu meemburs vhu ere-a lucked oooot vhee zeey try tu lugeen:
